https://tmrev.io/movie/903128-Death Jesus 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Chilean science fiction low-budget film about a death metal band trio who steal a crucifix from a church in order to make their album's cover. Christ's figure not only is brought to life but also joins the band as a singer, provoking Satan's himself anger. Death Jesus
